message.content:
Step 1: Calculate the Accounts Receivable Turnover Ratio.
• Formula: Accounts Receivable Turnover Ratio = Main Business Revenue / Average Accounts Receivable
• From the balance sheet, Accounts Receivable:
  Initial = 0.00  End = 1,562,598.26
• Average Accounts Receivable = (0.00 + 1,562,598.26) / 2 = 781,299.13
• Main Business Revenue from the income statement = 5,695,115.02
• Therefore, Accounts Receivable Turnover Ratio = 5,695,115.02 / 781,299.13 ≈ 7.29

Step 2: Calculate the Operating Cash Flow ratio (which is the operating cash flow to current liabilities ratio).
• Formula: Operating Cash Flow Ratio = Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities / Total Current Liabilities
• From the cash flow statement, Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities = –224,133.22
• From the balance sheet, Total Current Liabilities (at period end) = 829,755.77
• Operating Cash Flow Ratio = –224,133.22 / 829,755.77 ≈ –0.27

Step 3: Calculate the Total Asset Turnover Ratio.
• Formula: Total Asset Turnover Ratio = Main Business Revenue / Average Total Assets
• From the balance sheet, Total Assets:
  Initial = 13,000,000.00  End = 15,023,526.85
• Average Total Assets = (13,000,000.00 + 15,023,526.85) / 2 = 14,011,763.43
• Main Business Revenue = 5,695,115.02
• Total Asset Turnover Ratio = 5,695,115.02 / 14,011,763.43 ≈ 0.41

Step 4: Calculate the Debt to Equity Ratio.
• Formula: Debt to Equity Ratio = Total Liabilities / Total Owner’s Equity
• In the balance sheet, the only liabilities provided are the current liabilities. (No non‐current liabilities are separately listed, so we use Total Liabilities = Total Current Liabilities.)
  Total Liabilities (End) = 829,755.77
  Total Owner’s Equity (End) = 14,193,771.08
• Debt to Equity Ratio = 829,755.77 / 14,193,771.08 ≈ 0.0585, which rounds to 0.06

Thus, the ratios are:
• Accounts Receivable Turnover Ratio ≈ 7.29  
• Operating Cash Flow Ratio (and Operating Cash Flow to Current Liabilities Ratio) ≈ –0.27  
• Total Asset Turnover Ratio ≈ 0.41  
• Debt to Equity Ratio ≈ 0.06

The final answer is provided in the JSON format below.

{
  "solution": {
    "Accounts Receivable Turnover Ratio": "7.29",
    "operating cash flow ratio": "-0.27",
    "operating cash flow to current liabilities ratio": "-0.27",
    "Total Asset Turnover Ratio": "0.41",
    "Debt to Equity Ratio": "0.06"
  }
}
